description: Multi-objective optimization problems requiring system-level thinking

problems.prompt: Design a buck converter for high-power laser diode array in industrial cutting system. Input: 48V, Output: 2V at 100A for laser diode bar. Must achieve <1% current ripple for beam quality, handle 10kHz pulsing, and survive reflected beam events (sudden load dump).

Design a flyback converter for implantable pacemaker powered by lithium-iodine primary cell. Input: 2.8V (fresh) to 1.8V (EOS), Output: 5V at 1mA average. Must achieve 10-year battery life, <5μA quiescent current, and meet FDA Class III medical device requirements.

Design a boost converter for fuel cell vehicle powertrain. Input: 200V-400V from PEMFC stack, Output: 650V DC link at 150kW peak. Must track fuel cell V-I characteristic, survive load rejection, and meet automotive functional safety ASIL-D.

Design a forward converter for offshore wind turbine nacelle control systems. Input: 690V AC rectified (975V DC), Output: 24V at 20A. Must survive 25-year offshore exposure, handle salt fog and humidity, and operate during grid faults.

Design a SEPIC converter for aviation emergency locator transmitter (ELT). Input: 4V-9V from lithium primary or alkaline pack, Output: 12V at 1A for RF PA. Must operate at -55°C to +70°C, survive 100g crash shock, and broadcast for 48 hours continuously.

Design a half-bridge resonant converter for submarine battery charging from diesel generator. Input: 440V AC rectified (620V DC), Output: 120V at 200A for lead-acid battery bank. Must be silent (<40dBA), non-magnetic (degaussing compatibility), and survive depth charging shock.

Design a buck converter for selective laser sintering (SLS) 3D printer laser. Input: 48V, Output: 5V at 60A for fiber laser pump diodes. Must support 500kHz modulation for scan pattern, <0.5% current accuracy for layer consistency, and thermal stability during 72-hour prints.

Design a flyback converter for remote pipeline cathodic protection system. Input: 12V-48V from solar panel or thermoelectric generator, Output: -1.5V to -3V adjustable at 50A for ground bed. Must operate unattended for 5 years, survive lightning, and handle highly variable load impedance.

Design a full-bridge converter for Hyperloop pod systems power. Input: 800V DC from linear induction motor regeneration, Output: 48V at 100A for electronics and HVAC. Must survive vacuum environment (100Pa), 1000km/h vibration profile, and electromagnetic interference from propulsion.

Design a Ćuk converter for tokamak fusion reactor diagnostic systems. Input: 24V from UPS, Output: -15V at 5A for detector electronics. Must survive 10T magnetic fields, reject magnetic pickup noise, and operate during plasma disruptions with 100kA/ms current transients in the environment.
